resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/74778</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>74778</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40b2660e-5ee0-442b-225c-45343d8d6709#1#3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Az országalma, 12. század, Parlament, Budapest, átmérő 8,9 cm, kettőskerezszt 7,9 cm, aranyozott ezüst.</string>
            <string language="en">The orb, 12th century, Parliament, Budapest, diameter 8,9 cm, double cross 7,9 cm, gilded silver.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Kugel, 12. Jahrhundert, Parlament, Budapest, 
Durchmesser 8.9 Zentimeter, Betrug 7.9 Zentimeter, vergoldetes Silber.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le corps rond, 12ème siècle, le Parlement, 
Budapest, diamètre 8.9 centimètres, double croix 7.9 centimètres, 
argent doré.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O orb, 1ò século, parliament, Budapest, 
diâmetro 8.9 cm, cruz dobro 7.9 cm, prata gilded.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il orb, dodicesimo secolo, Parlamento, Budapest, 
diametro 8.9 centimetri, doppia traversa 7.9 centimetri, argento 
gilded.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο σφαίρα, 12$ος αιώνας, το Κοινοβούλιο, Βουδαπέστη, 
διάμετρος 8.9 εκατ., διπλασιάζει διαγώνια 7.9 εκατ., 
επιχρυσωμένο ασήμι.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El orbe, 12mo siglo, el parlamento, 
Budapest, diámetro 8.9 centímetros, cruz doble 7.9 centímetros, 
plata dorada.</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Az országalma egy gömbrészre erősített kettőskeresztből áll. A gömbrészen Anjou-címer.</string>
            <string language="en">The orb is made up of a double cross braced to a ball. There is an Anjou-shield on the ball.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">országalma,  Anjou,  Károly Róbert,  </string>
            <string language="en">Orb, Anjou, Charles Roberto</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Kugel besteht einen Betrug, der zu einer Kugel 
befestigt wird. Es gibt ein Anjou-Schild auf der Kugel.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le corps rond se compose d'une double croix attachée à 
une boule. Il y a un Anjou-bouclier sur la boule.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O orb é composto de uma cruz dobro apoiada a uma esfera. 
Há um Anjou-protetor na esfera.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il orb si compone di doppia traversa rinforzata ad una 
sfera. Ci è uno Anjou-schermo sulla sfera.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο σφαίρα αποτελείται από έναν διπλό σταυρό που 
ενισχύεται σε μια σφαίρα. Υπάρχει μια Anjou-aspj'da στη 
σφαίρα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El orbe se compone de una cruz doble apoyada a una 
bola. Hay un Anjou-blindaje en la bola.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kugel, Anjou, Charles Roberto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Corps rond, Anjou, Charles Roberto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Orb, Anjou, Charles Roberto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Orb, Anjou, Charles Roberto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σφαίρα, Anjou, Charles Roberto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Orbe, Anjou, Charles Roberto</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:Nemzeti Tankönyvkiadó Rt.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>591</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>74778</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
